My dad was in the restaurant industry for 30 years, and he worked really hard...
...and he didn't want any of his children to work in the restaurant industry.
I thought that the only thing I'd ever be is be honest and truthful,...
...and cooking wound up being something I love to do.
It was the first time in my life where I was like, I wanna wake up early.
I wanna get to work and I wanna be a sponge,...
...and I wanna help out as much as possible.
And it sort of dawned on me that, you know,...
...like very few people ever get to experience that.
